mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, is_deleted, message_name, message_type, summary, status
mapper.select:
select message_type.*, create_user.username as create_username, update_user.username as update_username from sys_message_type message_type left join sys_user create_user on create_user.id = message_type.create_user left join sys_user update_user on update_user.id = message_type.update_user
message_type.is_deleted = 0
and status = #{dto.status}
and message_type.message_name like CONCAT('%',#{dto.messageName},'%')
and message_type.message_type like CONCAT('%',#{dto.messageType},'%')
and message_type.summary like CONCAT('%',#{dto.summary},'%')
